spec_data.Name: perl-Text-TabularDisplay
spec_data.Description:
Text::TabularDisplay simplifies displaying textual data in a table. The
output is identical to the columnar display of query results in the MySQL
text monitor.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 05:29:34 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Display text in formatted table output
